actions.name: get-task-details
actions.description: Retrieves the details of a specific task executed by a Browse AI robot.

actions.name: list-robots
actions.description: Retrieves all robots available in your account.

actions.name: run-robot
actions.description: Runs a robot on-demand with custom input parameters.

triggers.name: task_finished_successfully
triggers.description: Triggers when a robot finishes a task successfully.

triggers.name: task_finished_with_error
triggers.description: Triggers when a robot task run fails with an error.
